stempy.manifold.compute_nodes¶

stempy.manifold.compute_nodes(init_xy)[source]¶

Compute nodes (structured array) from initial layout

Parameters

init_xy (array) – the initial layout

Returns

nodes (structured array)

Examples

>>> xy = [(0., 0.), (1., 1.)]
>>> node_dtype = np.dtype([('x', np.float64), ('y', np.float64)])
>>> # Convert to structured array
>>> nodes = np.array(xy, dtype=node_dtype)
>>> # access x and y
>>> nodes['x']
>>> nodes['y']
